scripts.test: mocha --compilers js:babel/register test/replay/db.js test/replay/user.js test/replay/type.js test/replay/item.js test/replay/http.js test/replay/socket.js
scripts.transpile: rm -rf dir && babel app/ --modules common --stage 1 --ignore app/lib/mung/node_modules --out-dir dist/
scripts.hot-transpile: rm -rf dir && babel app/ --watch --modules common --stage 1 --ignore app/lib/mung/node_modules --out-dir dist/
scripts.less: lessc assets/less/index.less assets/css/index.css; lessc assets/less/training.less assets/css/training.css
